given.text:
I was fortunate to work with Yi for three years in ADAS development for Navigation system. He has helped building and led my China team with five engineers. I am very impressed with his technical skills, overall understanding of system, and wide ranges of problems he has resolved over the years. He is creative and detail-orientated. In addition, Yi is an excellent team-player who can work very well in a team environment and help those who needs it. I am happy to recommend him and I think he will be a great asset to have in a team.
